title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your powers of perception are heightened today. Perhaps youre not inclined to enjoy reading the fine print of anything, but you can read between the lines fantastically well. In fact, empathic connections with strangers and friends alike are possible while cerebral Mercury harmoniously trines psychic Neptune in your sensitive sign. Dont be surprised if youre able to accurately glean how life is going for a buddy, even from a quick text. Nevertheless, its still important to ask. Most people appreciate being seen, but no one wants an invasion of their privacy. Author Dean Koontz wrote, Intuition is seeing with the soul. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
